comments.author: Darlen Chacon Winter

comments.text:
+Darlen Chacon Winter Hi




Names: (ages to turn or turned this year)Freddy K ripped top= 
Jungkook/Kookie ( aged 18)Leather jacket/butt slapper= V/Taehyung/Tae 
(20)Red trousers/pants= Jimin (20)Suit= Rapmonster/Namjoon (21)Car guy= 
J-Hope/Hoseok/Hobie/Hope (21)Hat wearer= Suga/Yoongi (22)white top with one 
hole= Jin (23)


Short profile: Namjoon (D-A-N-C-E Monster/Appa
Joonie)- the leader of the group and it's father figure, main rapper, is 
very
clumsy and so is known to break a lot of stuff/lose things, is perhaps the
worst dancer and used to hate dancing because he was so bad (though I think
he's pretty good). Also sings really well and is known to cause eargasms 
with his
voice and lyrics. See further 'Trouble', 'Look Here' and 'Expensive 
Girl' Jin(The Pink Princess/Eomma Jin)- loves pink, is the group's mother, 
is the visual
and considered the best looking, is a vocal liner (singer), is famous for 
his
shoulders, cooks to more or less chef standards and is good at the traffic
light dance and the dislocated shoulder dance. Caused severe eargasms in
'Trouble'. 
Yoongi (#Swagmeister)- rapper line, writes a lot of his own
raps/lyrics and general songs for the group both on his own and with other
members, is the grampa of the group, you do not ever disturb his sleep (gf
travel neck pillow) can also sing and when really actively involved in 
Bangtan
Bombs (search this they are great to get to know them) is great fun to 
watch. 
Hobie(sweet and caring J-Horse)- dancer line but is a triple threat (sings, 
dances
and raps), is known for his girl group dances with a particular obsession 
for
'Touch My Body' by Sistar. does cute concept stuff best in my opinion with
especially cute noises, has a memorable 'dancing face', is the most caring
arguably in the group and was nick named J-Horse because of the slightly 
long
face. Particularly known touchy-feely person who loves skinship with the
others- particularly Jimin and Tae. 
Jimin (The Body/Sweet Boy)- dancer line but
also sings (he does all the falsettos usually), has the best loved 
butt/thighs
and over all body though insists Jin's is better. Is known for his sweet
disposition never getting angry for long and forgiving Kookie for not 
calling
him 'Hyung' which shows his older age and is tradition/denotes respect and
therefore without is disrespectful. 
Tae (4D Alien)- vocal line, has a problem
keeping his tongue in his mouth and has killer hip movements, is known for
being a seriously outside the box thinker with the members considering him 
an
alien (lovingly not in a bad way), is generally really innocent aside from
tongue/hip thing, loves acting and wants to be in a movie or something. Fans
consider him the love child of Daehyun from BAP and Baekhyun from EXO who 
are
also aliens and look very like him.
Kookie (the golden maknae)- is the baby of the group at 17 (18 in 
September) which is why he is called the maknae, does everything really 
well (dances/sings/raps/beat boxes/girl group dance leader...)
I could go on. School wise though if it's not music, art or p.e. he dislikes
it. Is perhaps the sexiest when he tries to be which is bad news for noonas
(older women) like me (I'm 22). 
Hope this helps to get you started. Also good idea to watch their shows 
'Rookie King' and 'American Hustle Life' as well as their'Bangtan Bombs' 
and interviews like on 'Weekly Idol and 'Beatles Code'.
